response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit you. Considering the value it offers, I propose a price of $7,500 for this exceptional product. This offer includes a comprehensive warranty and a dedicated support package to ensure your satisfaction. I look forward to your consideration and hope we can bring this product to enhance your experience.", "product_price": 7500}
